content: Congrats Brother gmcneill on becoming a Master Mason. I know you will be proud to wear your Dad's and Grandfather's ring. You'll notice that on the ring both points of the compasses are elevated above the square indicating the person wearing the ring is a Master Mason or should be anyway. As every other Master Mason will attest the ring, pin, or car emblem is displayed with pride knowing you are member of the greatest fraternity in the world.
